name: youds/youds
description: YoudsFramework is a full-featured MVC-style framework for PHP5 with a strong focus on structure, code reusability and flexibility.

suggest.phpunit/phpunit: Install phpunit if you want to run your tests
suggest.ext-xsl: Required only for transformation of pre 1.0 style configuration files
suggest.ext-tokenizer: Enable the tokenizer extension allows YoudsFramework to generate more efficient config-caches
suggest.ext-session: If the session extension is disabled you'll have to build your own session storage system and hook it into youds
suggest.ext-xmlrpc: Enable the xmlrpc extension if you want to use XML-RPC features
suggest.ext-soap: Enable the xmlrpc extension if you want to use YoudsFramework's SOAP features
suggest.ext-pdo: PDO is required for database connectors that use PDO as base
suggest.ext-iconv: Enable iconv if you need to convert between other charset than iso-8859-1 and utf-8
